publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3558 Margaret Smith: Tobacco Advertising—That the Parliament notes that the Tobacco Advertising and Promotion Bill is reaching its final legislative stages at Westminster; congratulates the Liberal Democrat Peer Lord Clement-Jones for introducing the Private Member’s Bill which has led to this stage; believes that a UK- wide ban is the most effective way forward; considers that smoking contributes to 13,000 deaths a year in Scotland, and welcomes the evidence that suggests that such a ban may save 300 lives a year and cut tobacco consumption by 2.5%.
